## onTeardown() function

Add a callback to execute during the teardown phase of the test case.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function onTeardown(config: Config, callback: TeardownHook): void;
```

|  callback | [TeardownHook](./pentf.teardownhook.md) |  |
